title: paalaya sri
sahitya:
pAlaya shrI raghuvIra su-krpAlaya rAjakumAr mAm

caraNam 1

 tarAdhIsha vadana rAma tarAdhIsha damana mAm
   
caraNam 2

 rAkSasa janagaNa dUrAmaka rAkSasa smaravara shUra mAm
   
caraNam 3

 shrI dasharatha kula sharaNa rAma shrI dAsharati mada haraNa mAm
   
caraNam 4

 kumanO janagaNa bhIma rAma sumanO vAridhi sOma mAm
   
caraNam 5

 jaya vijayaghavi rAma ravi jaya sulalita nAma mAm
   
caraNam 6

 himakara kOTi nibhAnga E himakara haraNa nissanga mAm
   
caraNam 7

 yAga rAjanuta sharaNani tyAgarAjadhara suguNa mAm
